abilities.title: Combat A.I. protocols
abilities.text: After an allied Battle Droid Unit makes a combat action, choose one of the targeted characters that is within 4 of all characters in this Unit, if able. The chosen character gains [strain] or . Well, I guess I'm in charge, now When this Unit's Order Card would be placed in reserve, its controlling player may place it on the bottom of their Order Deck instead. I hate this job While a character in this Unit is contesting one or more Active objectives, it has Protection .
